to identify that problem area it was log

our bias towards directly jumping to

so we stepped back and we emulated an

and were able to get the run down to

significant reduction because we could

aspect of infrastructure
for bioinformatics when you publish you
want to have um
the compute processes need to be

got the team using cloud formation

were feeling pretty good
but again our bias for complexity we
really wanted to get to that next level

so we we substituted the
